SELECT MS_SHINSA.MS_SHINSA_ID, MS_SHINSA.MS_SHINSA_NAME, MS_SHINSA.KANKAKU,
MS_SHINSA.DELETE_FLAG, MS_SHINSA.SEND_FLAG, MS_SHINSA.VESSEL_ID, MS_SHINSA.DATA_NO, MS_SHINSA.USER_KEY, MS_SHINSA.RENEW_DATE, MS_SHINSA.RENEW_USER_ID, MS_SHINSA.TS FROM MS_SHINSA where MS_SHINSA.DELETE_FLAG = 0

SELECT MS_SHINSA.MS_SHINSA_ID, MS_SHINSA.MS_SHINSA_NAME, MS_SHINSA.KANKAKU,
MS_SHINSA.DELETE_FLAG, MS_SHINSA.SEND_FLAG, MS_SHINSA.VESSEL_ID, MS_SHINSA.DATA_NO, MS_SHINSA.USER_KEY, MS_SHINSA.RENEW_DATE, MS_SHINSA.RENEW_USER_ID, MS_SHINSA.TS FROM MS_SHINSA WHERE MS_SHINSA.MS_SHINSA_ID = :MS_SHINSA_ID

INSERT INTO MS_SHINSA( MS_SHINSA_ID, MS_SHINSA_NAME, KANKAKU,
DELETE_FLAG, SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO, USER_KEY, RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, TS ) VALUES( :MS_SHINSA_ID, :MS_SHINSA_NAME, :KANKAKU, :DELETE_FLAG, :SEND_FLAG, :VESSEL_ID, :DATA_NO, :USER_KEY, :RENEW_DATE, :RENEW_USER_ID, :TS )

UPDATE MS_SHINSA SET MS_SHINSA_NAME = :MS_SHINSA_NAME, KANKAKU = :KANKAKU,
DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG, SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO = :DATA_NO, USER_KEY = :USER_KEY, RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID WHERE (MS_SHINSA_ID = :MS_SHINSA_ID) AND (TS = :TS)

SELECT MS_SHINSA.MS_SHINSA_ID, MS_SHINSA.MS_SHINSA_NAME, MS_SHINSA.KANKAKU,
MS_SHINSA.DELETE_FLAG, MS_SHINSA.SEND_FLAG, MS_SHINSA.VESSEL_ID, MS_SHINSA.DATA_NO, MS_SHINSA.USER_KEY, MS_SHINSA.RENEW_DATE, MS_SHINSA.RENEW_USER_ID, MS_SHINSA.TS FROM MS_SHINSA LEFT OUTER JOIN KS_SHOUSHO_SHINSA_LINK ON KS_SHOUSHO_SHINSA_LINK.MS_SHINSA_ID = MS_SHINSA.MS_SHINSA_ID WHERE KS_SHOUSHO_SHINSA_LINK.KS_SHOUSHO_ID = :KS_SHOUSHO_ID
